title: Insertion automation doesn't work for final versioned packages
body:
I ran two builds of the 17.6.0 package version today, and they both had bad insertions:

- [x] using the "vs1x.y" release definition produced https://devdiv.visualstudio.com/DevDiv/_git/VS/pullrequest/462020 which didn't update the MSBuild packages at all
- [ ] using the "main" release definition produced https://devdiv.visualstudio.com/DevDiv/_git/VS/commit/11f0ca3e4e221574c2044d5c229ad36a1ef82034 which updated the MSBuild package refs to the `-prerelease` version rather than the final GA version.

nodes.body: `main` example on a non-final versioned build (normal): https://devdiv.visualstudio.com/DevDiv/_git/VS/pullrequest/463523

`main` example on a final-versioned build: https://devdiv.visualstudio.com/DevDiv/_git/VS/pullrequest/463535

I think we're good now.
